content.heading: Audio Element
paragraphs: The <audio> element plays audio files, using <source> for multiple formats.

content.heading: Basic Audio
paragraphs: Use controls for play, pause, and volume:

<audio controls>
  <source src="sound.mp3" type="audio/mpeg">
  <source src="sound.ogg" type="audio/ogg">
  Your browser does not support audio.
</audio>

content.heading: Autoplay
paragraphs:
<audio controls autoplay muted>
  <source src="intro.mp3" type="audio/mpeg">
  <source src="intro.ogg" type="audio/ogg">
  Your browser does not support audio.
</audio>

content.heading: JavaScript Control
paragraphs: Use DOM methods (play(), pause()), properties (currentTime, volume), and events (onplay, onpause) for audio control.
